actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To provide for additional requirements when Federal banking agencies undertake rulemakings that implement policies of non-governmental international organizations, to require Federal banking agencies to report on certain covered international organizations, and for other purposes.
short_title: Ensuring U.S. Authority over U.S. Banking Regulations Act

titles.title: Ensuring U.S. Authority over U.S. Banking Regulations Act
Ensuring U.S. Authority over U.S. Banking Regulations Act

To provide for additional requirements when Federal banking agencies undertake rulemakings that implement policies of non-governmental international organizations, to require Federal banking agencies to report on certain covered international organizations, and for other purposes.
